name: Zombies By Midnight
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Mouse Right Click - Interact or Buy

Mouse Left Click - Shoot

Objective: 

Collect coins, purchase randomized weapons and defeat enemies. Take a visit to the basement to trade your weapon for coins, purchase ammo for the weapon you've been liking or buy a snack to boost your health. Make your way to the red exit door to escape this zombie infested diner!

Weapon Parts:

small gun: less damage, shorter range

bigger gun: more damage, longer range 

single bullet: faster cooldown

triple bullet: longer cooldown 

# ammo: makes you heavier, affects your speed 

Note: Unfortunately, it plays a bit clunky and the game is not fully complete/balanced. Hope you enjoy regardless!

Music track used
